com.hc.blockchain.service.wallet

接口 ITokenTransactionService


  • public interface ITokenTransactionService
    接口IEthereumTransactionService代币转账服务层接口

    主要包括代币转账

    从以下版本开始:
    2018/11/26 11:31
    另请参阅:
    TokenTransactionServiceImpl

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      com.hc.blockchain.dto.output.TransactionOutput transfer(com.hc.blockchain.dto.input.TokenTransactionInput input, byte chainID)
      代币转账接口 TokenTransactionInput input = new TokenTransactionInput(); // 1.默认账户from转出 String from = "0x938219B7D0BcF136110d745369A4872C862BaC3e"; // 2.默认账户to转入 String to = "0xf9a9bF738E4c6F7875ccfc1c854D7740a2ecaC44"; // 合约地址 String contractAddress = "0x3989a352dddef646168cd885f637f63ebb9b121c"; // 3.金额 String amount = "200"; input.setContractAddress(contractAddress); input.setAmount(amount); input.setFrom(from); input.setTo(to); input.setGasLimit("21000"); String gasPrice = "3"; input.setGasPrice(gasPrice); input.setKeystore("{\"address\":\"938219b7d0bcf136110d745369a4872c862bac3e\", \"id\":\"f39c7851-268c-4255-84b9-2ed062126c7c\",\"version\":3,\"crypto\":{\"cipher\":\"aes-128-ctr\",\"ciphertext\":\"7b2b4c834693d792bce8880dd0d968f627b5c29e5be525cab984fff7da7e89af\",\"cipherparams\":{\"iv\":\"f1982fd4b44e1ff03e231197999c73c8\"},\"kdf\":\"scrypt\",\"kdfparams\":{\"dklen\":32,\"n\":4096,\"p\":6,\"r\":8,\"salt\":\"a0fa354e2256c2726588d8872db72e4752e0b920d90ee5fa2c20076faa5fd75c\"},\"mac\":\"d03975a6282cb45e1f37b743c17efdbee67da32c9d0785deb5b6031e37cdb73a\"}}"); input.setPassword("123456789"); // 4.执行转账 TransactionOutput output = service.transfer(input, ChainId.Ropsten);

    • 方法详细资料

      • transfer

        com.hc.blockchain.dto.output.TransactionOutput transfer(com.hc.blockchain.dto.input.TokenTransactionInput input,
                                                        byte chainID)

        代币转账接口

             
 TokenTransactionInput input = new TokenTransactionInput();
 // 1.默认账户from转出
 String from = "0x938219B7D0BcF136110d745369A4872C862BaC3e";
 // 2.默认账户to转入
 String to = "0xf9a9bF738E4c6F7875ccfc1c854D7740a2ecaC44";
 // 合约地址
 String contractAddress = "0x3989a352dddef646168cd885f637f63ebb9b121c";
 // 3.金额
 String amount = "200";
 input.setContractAddress(contractAddress);
 input.setAmount(amount);
 input.setFrom(from);
 input.setTo(to);
 input.setGasLimit("21000");
 String gasPrice = "3";
 input.setGasPrice(gasPrice);
 input.setKeystore("{\"address\":\"938219b7d0bcf136110d745369a4872c862bac3e\",
 \"id\":\"f39c7851-268c-4255-84b9-2ed062126c7c\",\"version\":3,\"crypto\":{\"cipher\":\"aes-128-ctr\",\"ciphertext\":\"7b2b4c834693d792bce8880dd0d968f627b5c29e5be525cab984fff7da7e89af\",\"cipherparams\":{\"iv\":\"f1982fd4b44e1ff03e231197999c73c8\"},\"kdf\":\"scrypt\",\"kdfparams\":{\"dklen\":32,\"n\":4096,\"p\":6,\"r\":8,\"salt\":\"a0fa354e2256c2726588d8872db72e4752e0b920d90ee5fa2c20076faa5fd75c\"},\"mac\":\"d03975a6282cb45e1f37b743c17efdbee67da32c9d0785deb5b6031e37cdb73a\"}}");
 input.setPassword("123456789");
 // 4.执行转账
 TransactionOutput output = service.transfer(input, ChainId.Ropsten);
        参数:
        input - 钱包入参对象 TokenTransactionInput
        chainID - 以太坊网络类型编号 chainID:1-主网; chainID:3-Ropsten测试网络
        返回:
        TransactionOutput
        另请参阅:
        ChainId, TransactionOutput, TokenTransactionInput
